title: 求会空岛插件的大佬
author: 小鲤鱼XLY
txt_content:
有哪位大佬会解决[attach]1122045[/attach]我装了空岛插件后输入is 它显示了3行英文这该如何解决？
我需要完美的解决方法哟！最好过程讲的详细一点

replies.author: 小鲤鱼XLY
replies.txt_content:
这是那三行英文
more set up is required before the plugin can start
edit config.yml then restart server
make sure you set island distance lf upgrading set it to what it was before
